content:
I find there's a now sentence at the beginning of every sequence example,
This is the narrative for the resource. See also the XML or JSON format. This example conforms to the profile Sequence.
I think it should be resource Sequence cause Sequence is a resource.
@Lloyd McKenzie
@Xiao Luo Can you submit a change request (the "propose a change" link at the bottom of each page in the spec)
